flawed_nl_solution:
The garden produced 237 potatoes - 60 = <<237-60=717>>717 cucumbers.
The garden produced 717 cucumbers * 2 peppers/cucumber = <<717*2=1434>>1434 peppers.
The garden produced 237 potatoes + 717 cucumbers + 1434 peppers = <<237+717+1434=2388>>2388 vegetables.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 177, not 717. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
